minigame.chat.mode.switch.specificTeam: You are now chatting in %s's team chat
minigame.chat.mode.switch.ownTeam: You are now chatting in your team's chat
minigame.chat.mode.switch.admin: You are now chatting in the admins' chat
minigame.chat.mode.switch.spectator: You are now chatting in the spectators' chat
minigame.chat.mode.switch.global: You are now chatting in the global chat
minigame.chat.mode.switch.alreadySelecte: You are already chatting in that chat!
minigame.command.argument.minigame.resol: Too many Minigames with given id
minigame.command.argument.minigame.noCon: You are not part of a minigame
minigame.command.context.noMinigameOfTyp: Context provides no minigame of type %s
minigame.command.gamemode.success: Successfully updated gamemode to %s for targets
minigame.command.players.add.fail: Failed to add any players to minigame
minigame.command.players.remove.fail: Failed to remove any players from minigame
minigame.command.team.admin: Successfully set %s to be the admin team
minigame.command.team.spectator: Successfully set %s to be the spectator team
minigame.command.phase.set: Successfully set phase of minigame %s to %s
minigame.command.create.fail: Failed to parse parameters, invalid JSON object
minigame.command.pause.noMinigame: No minigame context found, unable to pause minigame
minigame.command.unpause.ready.teams: Click %s to view the awaiting teams
minigame.command.unpause.ready.players: Click %s to view the awaiting players
minigame.command.unpause.countdown: Click %s to start the unpause countdown!
minigame.command.team.randomizer.fail: Failed to completely generate teams, you must delete some unused teams first!
minigame.settings.canPvp.name: PvP
minigame.settings.canPvp.desc.1: If enabled this will allow players to pvp with one another.
minigame.settings.canGetHungry.name: Hunger
minigame.settings.canGetHungry.desc.1: If enabled this will cause players to lose hunger over time.
minigame.settings.canTakeDamage.name: Damage
minigame.settings.canTakeDamage.desc.1: If enabled players will be able to take damage.
minigame.settings.canBreakBlocks.name: Break Blocks
minigame.settings.canBreakBlocks.desc.1: If enabled players will be able to break blocks.
minigame.settings.canPlaceBlocks.name: Place Blocks
minigame.settings.canPlaceBlocks.desc.1: If enabled players will be able to place blocks.
minigame.settings.canDropItems.name: Drop Items
minigame.settings.canDropItems.desc.1: If enabled players will be able to drop items.
minigame.settings.canPickupItems.name: Pickup Items
minigame.settings.canPickupItems.desc.1: If enabled players will be able to pick up items.
minigame.settings.canAttackEntities.name: Attack Entities
minigame.settings.canAttackEntities.desc: If enabled players will be able to attack all other entities.
minigame.settings.canInteractEntities.de: If enabled players will be able to interact with all other entities.
minigame.settings.canInteractBlocks.name: Interact With Blocks
minigame.settings.canInteractBlocks.desc: If enabled players will be able to interact with all other blocks.
minigame.settings.canInteractItems.name: Interact With Items
If enabled players will be able to interact with all items.
minigame.settings.canInteractAll.name: Interact With Everything
minigame.settings.canInteractAll.desc.1: If enabled players will be able to interact with blocks, entities, and items.
minigame.settings.canInteractAll.desc.2: If disabled players will no longer be able to interact with them.
minigame.settings.useVanillaChat.name: Use Vanilla Chat
minigame.settings.useVanillaChat.desc.1: If this is enabled then vanilla chat is used for the minigame chat.
minigame.settings.useVanillaChat.desc.2: Global Chat must also be enabled.
minigame.settings.canCrossChat.name: Cross Chat
minigame.settings.canCrossChat.desc.1: If this is enabled then the entire server can see chat messages from players in the minigame,
minigame.settings.canCrossChat.desc.2: and players in the minigame can see global messages.
minigame.settings.isChatGlobal.name: Global Chat
minigame.settings.isChatGlobal.desc.1: If disabled then by default messages will be sent to teams.
minigame.settings.isChatGlobal.desc.2: To send messages to global players must prefix their message with !.
minigame.settings.isChatMuted.name: Mute Chat
minigame.settings.isChatMuted.desc.1: If enabled, players will not be able to talk in chat.
minigame.settings.formatGlobalSystemChat: If enabled, system messages will be formatted using the minigame's formatting.
minigame.settings.mobsWithNoAIAreFlammab: Mobs With No AI Are Flammable
If enabled mobs with no AI can be set on fire.
minigame.settings.tickFreezeOnPause.name: Tick Freeze On Pause
minigame.settings.tickFreezeOnPause.desc: When the minigame is paused the world will freeze all ticking, including players.
minigame.settings.freezeEntities.name: Freeze Entities
minigame.settings.freezeEntities.desc.1: This will freeze all entities including players.
minigame.settings.pauseOnServerStop.name: Pause On Server Stop
minigame.settings.pauseOnServerStop.desc: Pauses the minigame just before the server stops.
minigame.settings.canLookAroundWhenFroze: Allows players to look around while frozen.
minigame.settings.daylightCycle.name: Daylight Cycle
minigame.settings.daylightCycle.desc.1: Configures how fast the daylight cycle is.
